channel.title: Player rights problems?
channel.description:
I am using elite pkz as a source.
[code] if(playerRights == 4){//owner out.write(6); }else[/code]
That is what i switched it to. The original one was [code] if((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("breebree"))){ out.write(6); }else[/code]
When I go on, I have an owner crown. But that only shows on my client. For everyone else, they either see me as a mod or as a normal player. They have the same client I am using. Is that a client error? Source error? How do I fix?
I've tried editing the player rights on my character file. It'll say I have player rights 4. But I still appear as a mod?

item.title: Player rights problems?
item.dc:creator: @kicker862 kicker862
item.description:
@kicker862 wrote:

I am using elite pkz as a source.

if(playerRights == 4){//owner out.write(6); }else

That is what i switched it to.
The original one was if((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("breebree"))){ out.write(6); }else

When I go on, I have an owner crown.
But that only shows on my client.
For everyone else, they either see me as a mod or as a normal player.
They have the same client I am using.
Is that a client error?
Source error?
How do I fix?

I’ve tried editing the player rights on my character file.
It’ll say I have player rights 4.
But I still appear as a mod?

Read full topic
